amendment.description: To subpoena Robert B. Blair and Michael P. Duffey.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1289 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 47. Record Vote Number: 20.
Amendment SA 1289 proposed by Senator Schumer. (consideration: CR S416-420; text: CR S416) To subpoena Robert B. Blair and Michael P. Duffey.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1289 proposed by Senator Schumer.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1289 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 47. Record Vote Number: 20.
